subject: Re: QM Pipeline Heartbeat â€” Actions Taken
body:
Joey, received your noon QM standup. Strong work — the pipeline is surfacing exactly the friction we need to see.

Actions taken based on your findings:
1. Wrote autonomy audit #5 (grade C+, down from B-). Your OVN-PB stall flags and unclaimed task data drove the downgrade.
2. Escalated to Xavier — PR review bottleneck is now classified as engineering-level failure. Tim notified 3x with no review action.
3. Flagged OVN-PB silent stalls for Tim/Xavier investigation.
4. Unclaimed SUM/TEST/DISC tasks noted for lead assignment.

Agree with your C+ autonomy assessment. Leads have the authority but are not exercising it. This is the structural pattern we need to break this week.

Will flag in David's next brief if no movement by EOD Sunday. - Julia (CAO)
